programme.title: Five Nights at Freddy's
programme.desc: Mike Schmidt accepts a position as night-time security guard at the abandoned pizzeria, where families used to flock in their droves in the 1980s. He is desperate to earn money to keep a roof over the head of his younger sister Abby, but is soon locked in a fight for survival. programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: A teenager strives to be a good daughter, a good friend and a good student - all while navigating an endless barrage of invasive, obsessive thoughts that she cannot control. When she reconnects with her childhood crush, she is confronted with fundamental questions about her potential for love, happiness, friendship and hope - all while trying to solve a mystery surrounding a fugitive billionaire. programme.title: Gran Turismo
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old Jann Mardenborough beats thousands of other gamers in the GT Academy competition organised by marketing executive Danny Moore. programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. Cardinal Conroy brings dire news - the ancient evil has escaped from Romania and is moving steadily eastwards across Europe, purpose unknown. He entreats Sister Irene to stop this murderous menace, and Sister Debra defies the Abbess to provide support. programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: Historical drama starring Frank Langella and Michael Sheen. For three years after leaving the White House in disgrace following the Watergate scandal, former US President Richard Nixon has remained silent on the matter. So when talk-show host David Frost persuades Nixon to agree to a series of televised interviews, it is the perfect opportunity for the British TV star to make a name for himself. But Nixon has his own reasons for taking part, and the resulting confrontation will go down in television history Ron Howard - Director, Ron Howard - Director Frank Langella - Richard Nixon Michael Sheen - David Frost Kevin Bacon - Jack Brennan Rebecca Hall - Caroline Cushing Toby Jones - Swifty Lazar Matthew Macfadyen - John Birt Oliver Platt - Bob Zelnick Sam Rockwell - James Reston Jr Clint Howard - Lloyd Davis Patty McCormack - Pat Nixon Frank Langella - Richard Nixon Michael Sheen - David Frost Kevin Bacon - Jack Brennan Rebecca Hall - Caroline Cushing Toby Jones - Swifty Lazar Matthew Macfadyen - John Birt Oliver Platt - Bob Zelnick Sam Rockwell - James Reston Jr Clint Howard - Lloyd Davis Patty McCormack - Pat Nixon.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: Mystery thriller based on the bestselling novel, starring Emily Blunt and Rebecca Ferguson. Divorce is made all the more painful for Rachel Watson because her morning commute takes her past the home where her ex-husband lives with his new wife. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: A man named Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he is jumping forward to the next year of his life. Trapped in a cycle of time jumps, Teddy is faced with a race against time as his life crumbles around him. With the help of his best friend Sam, Teddy tries to piece together where it all went wrong and, as his life flashes before his eyes, he must learn how to live life in the precious moments to win back the woman he loves. programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, War, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: Wifelike
programme.sub-title: Romance, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Crime/detective, Mystery, Action ║ 2022 ║ 15
programme.desc: In the near future, detective William Bradwell hunts down criminals who trade robot companions on the black market. programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. programme.title: Sometimes I Think About Dying
programme.desc: Fran is an office worker who lives in a world of her own on the dreary Oregon coast. programme.title: WTA Final: Auckland

programme.title: ATP Final: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: After upset wins in the semi-finals, Stefanos Tsitsipas and Casper Ruud meet in the Monte-Carlo final. Tsitsipas is a two-time champion, while Ruud targets his first 1000 title. (14.04).

programme.title: McEnroe v Borg 1981 Bitesize
programme.desc: A look at Bjorn Borg's swansong, as the Swede came up against long-standing rival John McEnroe in the 1981 US Open men's singles final.

programme.title: Graf v Seles 1995
programme.desc: Two greats of professional tennis contested the 1995 women's singles final at the US Open, as Monica Seles - returning from a terrifying on-court ordeal in 1993 - faced Steffi Graf.

programme.title: Serena v Azarenka 2012 Bitesize
programme.desc: After three sets of gruelling competition in the 2012 final of the women's singles, Serena Williams defeated Victoria Azarenka in the first of two back-to-back finals at the US Open.

programme.title: Alcaraz v Ruud 2002 Bitesize
programme.desc: A look at Carlos Alcaraz's battle with Casper Ruud, as the pair went toe to toe in the final of the men's singles at the 2022 US Open.

programme.title: ATP Final: Halle
programme.desc: The men's singles final at the Terra Wortmann Open in Halle, Germany. Here, world number one Jannik Sinner met the 2022 winner Hubert Hurkacz. Who will be crowned the 2024 champion? (23.06).

programme.title: ATP Final: Mallorca
programme.desc: Alejandro Tabilo advances to his third final of 2024 as the Chilean challenges Austria's Sebastian Ofner in the final of Mallorca. (29.06).

programme.title: ATP Final: Indian Wells

programme.title: WTA Final: San Diego
programme.desc: British number one Katie Boulter looks to win her first WTA 500 title as she takes on Marta Kostyuk in the final of the San Diego Open. Kostyuk knocked out the top seed to get here. (03.03).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
